birthstones.name: *Garnet*
birthstones.description: A garnet is red and shiny.

birthstones.name: *Amethyst*
birthstones.description: A amethyst is purple and shiny. You could probably see you reflection in it.

birthstones.name: *Aquamarine*
birthstones.description: An aquamairne is light blue and shiny.It is a very pretty stone.

birthstones.name: *Diamond*
birthstones.description: A diamond is a very pretty stone. Most people like to wear it around their necks or their fingers.

birthstones.name: *Emerald*
birthstones.description: An emerald is green and shiny.It reminds me of a sea turtle.

birthstones.name: *Pearl*
birthstones.description: A pearl is round and white.Pearl's are often on necklaces.

birthstones.name: *Ruby*
birthstones.description: A ruby is nice and red. It very shiny.

birthstones.name: *Peridot*
birthstones.description: A Peridot is a pretty stone. It is light green, kind of like the color of weeds in the yard. Much prettier though.

birthstones.name: *Sapphire*
birthstones.description: A Sapphire is a pretty royal blue stone. I imagine it as a color on a kings cape.

birthstones.name: *Opal*
birthstones.description: Opal is very pretty. It is very colorful and kind of looks like bubble gum.

birthstones.name: *Topaz*
birthstones.description: Topaz can come in different colors. My favorite is the yellow topaz.

birthstones.name: *Tanzanite*
birthstones.description: This stone is similar to sapphire. It's a bit more purple.
